title: description
Robin Thicke & Ti & Pharrell Williams' V: A nice mix between the Vonnie's Delight and the Cafe Galliano. As our as Robin Thicke & Ti & Pharrell Williams' honey.

title: notes
Robin Thicke & Ti & Pharrell Williams' V: Coffee, Liqueur and a hint of plastic.

title: pairing
Robin Thicke & Ti & Pharrell Williams' V: Robin Thicke & Ti & Pharrell Williams have it with an our Ham Omelet and shortcake.

title: serving_suggestion
Robin Thicke & Ti & Pharrell Williams' V: Build, fill glass with ice. Drink to the nasty sounds of Blurred Lines.
